mapper.insert: insert into tb_project_repository (name, full_name, description, privacy, html_url, ssh_url) values (#{name}, #{fullName}, #{description}, #{privacy}, #{htmlUrl}, #{sshUrl});
mapper.update: update tb_project_repository set name = #{name}, full_name = #{fullName}, description = #{description}, privacy = #{privacy}, html_url = #{htmlUrl}, ssh_url = #{sshUrl}, active = true where full_name = #{fullName};
